channel.title: Can't load save games anymore
channel.description:
Hi, I have the problem, Black Mesa doesn't load my saves. I can start BM without problems, but when I try to load the last save the program gets stucks at 99% (or so) loading. Then I must stop hl2.exe in the task manager. I already reinstalled BM, but same problem :frowning:
PS: If someone speaks German, Im sure i could explain the problem better :smiley:

item.title: Can't load save games anymore
item.dc:creator: Shykat98985
item.description:
Why can’t load save games anymore?

environmental management system

Read full topic

item.title: Can't load save games anymore
item.dc:creator: Myxir
item.description:
I don’t know why, but now it works.
When i’m using the admin user on my PC, i can load the seve games without problems. I hope that it will be the same with thother users.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't load save games anymore
item.dc:creator: Myxir
item.description:
After two month of doing nothing…

Yes, i can start a new game, i can save it and i can load the new saves. But the old saves crash at this point (the latest few. i didnt try some older saves yet.).

And no, i cant remember downloading anyhing, that changes the bms folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't load save games anymore
item.dc:creator: Problematic_A-hole
item.description:
never seen this problem
however, see if it’s only regarding old saves
go to a map, save and see if it loads

besides that, did you download anything that require messing with the BMS folder?

Read full topic
